# Testing functions

## tests for covMatrix()
```{r}
## n > 2
n <- 3
X <- matrix(rnorm(n^2), ncol = n)
sig2 <- 1
l <- rep(1, n)
test <- covMatrix(X = X, sig2 = sig2, l = l)
test
```

```{r}
## n = 2
n <- 2
X <- matrix(rnorm(n^2), ncol = n)
sig2 <- 1
l <- rep(1, n)
test <- covMatrix(X = X, sig2 = sig2, l = l)
test
```
